heading: Diablo 4 Season of Blood Livestream, Our Thoughts
content: , everyone had a lot of thoughts on the Developer Livestream for Diablo 4's Season of Blood. You can catch up with what , or watch videos by our creators summarizing and analyzing the changes in preparation for the If you enjoy the videos and want to see more, don't forget to drop a sub & leave a like! Cramming a whole lot of information into a mere 13 minutes, summarized the changes coming to Season 2. During his Livestream Recap, spent a lot of time talking about how the changes accurately target problems, and how he is cautiously hopeful for the future of Diablo 4. In line with the analytical perspective he's known for, went on a deep dive, discussing each of the key changes in detail. In this livestream recap, talked about the changes he felt are most impactful, and some of the work that still needs to be done. In his Livestream Summary, went over all the information on Season 2 including Blizzard's recent news posts. For more on the Season of Blood Livestream, head on over to our Right now the is hard at work preparing for the Season of Blood, if you haven't already, head over to our and select the D4 role in to stay up to date with our content development. Written by: Reviewed by:
